basics.name: Matt Shirley
basics.summary: Tester and developer experienced in JavaScript, React and Python.

highlights: Developed and maintained an end-to-end functional and integration test framework (Python, JavaScript)
Created ChatOps tool to support the team in data creation and test processes (JavaScript)
Mentored testers in learning JavaScript, test development and processes
Implemented a context-driven, risk-based test process to ensure accountability while performing exploratory testing
Championed developing an accessibility culture within the development team
Reduced backlog and implemented small features for a web application (React, PHP, JavaScript)
Implemented a unit and functional front-end test suite (React, JavaScript)
Analyzed development risk and performed exploratory testing on major builds

work.summary: Traveled throughout Canada while working seasonly and as a web developer.
highlights: Developed small web applications for clients located in APAC (React, JavaScript)
Continued employment with Asia Pacific Digital providing technical consultation (JavaScript)
Worked seasonally as a Ski Lift Operator and volunteered for a variety of causes in local communities
Improved existing functionality by resolving bugs for a legacy web-application (JavaScript, PHP, SQL)
Oversaw the operations of Linux servers and observed functions to detect any possible errors
Communicated and performed troubleshooting with users to resolve defects

education.courses: Gathered fundamental understanding of database design, system modelling, test processes and web development.
